item.description:
Learn to be more assertive, direct, clear and free of guilt. Advocate for you as much as you give or advocate for others! An ongoing group could form from this.

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm
($40 - Sliding scale to $20)

Herb has taught assertiveness for many years and also is an the personality types expert with a focus on relationship dynamics with over 20 years experience teaching the Enneagram nationwide. He is the author of the Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, is an individual, couples and family therapist and also does phone sessions (including typing people by phone) using the Enneagram and Myers Briggs as tools for relationship healing and personal growth.

herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Assertiveness
